charaepi_ch0066_10_boss/2301_1101_0100_2:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] and Nemona
were in town one day when they came
across something shiny...
charaepi_ch0066_10_boss/2301_1201_0200_1: Hm? Something’s on the ground there...
charaepi_ch0066_10_boss/2301_1201_0300_1:
Oh, wait... This is one of those coins that a friend
of mine used to collect back in Paldea!
charaepi_ch0066_10_boss/2301_1201_0400_1:
Said it was hard to find them because they’re
scattered all over the place!
charaepi_ch0066_10_boss/2301_1201_0500_1:
I also heard there’s a Pokémon that really likes
these coins...
charaepi_ch0066_10_boss/2301_1201_0800_1:
“Our” property? You mean this belongs to you and
that Pokémon?
charaepi_ch0066_10_boss/2301_1201_1000_1:
This is Gholdengo! It’s known as the Coin Entity
Pokémon, and its body is seemingly made up of
a thousand coins!
charaepi_ch0066_10_boss/2301_1201_1100_1: Amazing! It’s so shiny, just like a treasure!
charaepi_ch0066_10_boss/2301_1201_1200_1:
Bwahahahaha! Right?! A befitting partner for
yours truly!
charaepi_ch0066_10_boss/2301_0402_1600_1:
Heheheh! Excellent! I like that response!
Behold my kingly shine and be amazed!
charaepi_ch0066_10_boss/2301_1201_1700_1: Hey, Lear! Where’d you meet Gholdengo?
charaepi_ch0066_10_boss/2301_1201_1800_1:
We found it lost in a storage room that holds my
family’s royal treasures.
charaepi_ch0066_10_boss/2301_1201_1900_1:
Sawyer was on patrol and found it together with
one of those coins.
charaepi_ch0066_10_boss/2301_1201_2000_1:
At the time, it hadn’t evolved yet, so it was still
a Gimmighoul.
charaepi_ch0066_10_boss/2301_1201_2100_1:
What was Gimmighoul doing in your royal
treasure trove?
charaepi_ch0066_10_boss/2301_1201_2200_1:
I suspect it was admiring the treasures the royal
family has amassed.
charaepi_ch0066_10_boss/2301_1201_2300_1:
After learning of its habits, though, I did notice
one thing...
charaepi_ch0066_10_boss/2301_1201_2400_1: It, like me, has SUPERB taste in treasures!
charaepi_ch0066_10_boss/2301_1201_2500_1:
We bonded over our shared appreciation of
treasure and formed a sync pair!
charaepi_ch0066_10_boss/2301_1201_2600_1:
Ooooh, so you became friends because you have
similar tastes! That sounds fun!
charaepi_ch0066_10_boss/2301_1201_2700_1:
If I remember correctly, in order to evolve
Gimmighoul into Gholdengo...
charaepi_ch0066_10_boss/2301_1201_2800_1:
You have to collect a whole bunch of coins, right?
How’d you manage to do that?
charaepi_ch0066_10_boss/2301_1201_2900_1:
With my financial prowess, that took me no time
at all!
charaepi_ch0066_10_boss/2301_1201_3100_1:
Not fair?! Look, money is power—MY kind of
power, got it?
charaepi_ch0066_10_boss/2301_1201_3200_1:
I don’t regret my investments in Gholdengo.
However, one complication worries me...
charaepi_ch0066_10_boss/2301_1201_3300_1:
Gholdengo and Hoopa get along well...
Surprisingly well...
charaepi_ch0066_10_boss/2301_1201_3400_1: Isn’t that a good thing, though?
charaepi_ch0066_10_boss/2301_1201_3500_1:
It would be, if those two weren’t always playing
pranks all over Pasio!
charaepi_ch0066_10_boss/2301_1201_3600_1:
It was a pain to manage when it was just
Hoopa! But now that Gholdengo is getting
involved, they’re incorrigible!
charaepi_ch0066_10_boss/2301_0301_3700_1:
Sounds like they’re
livening things up!
charaepi_ch0066_10_boss/2301_0401_3800_1:
How dare you! You think just because this isn’t
your problem that you can speak out of turn?!
charaepi_ch0066_10_boss/2301_0402_4000_1:
You should watch your back as well, lest those
two play a prank on you!
charaepi_ch0066_10_boss/2301_1201_4100_1:
Oh, forget about all that! I wanna battle you
and Gholdengo!
charaepi_ch0066_10_boss/2301_1201_4300_1:
Hmph! Fine! I’ll make you regret challenging me
so casually!
